bike.description: All new BigHit FSR, 6061 ORE TT/DT, full cartridge bearing, ISCG mount, asymetrical rear triangle, 26" F/R wheel, adjustable geometry

components.description: Marzocchi Drop-Off Triple, 170mm travel, air assist, rebound adjustment, double clamp, 20mm thru axle
Truvativ Hussefelt, forged/CNC stem, 5 degree x 40mm, 31.8 clamp, black
Specialized Demo rise bar, 6061 alloy, 31.8mm, 6 degree upsweep, 9 degree backsweep
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc brake 8" Polygon rotor
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc with 8" Polygon rotor
Truvativ Hussefelt, 170mm with Truvativ chain guide
Truvativ Howitzer XR, oversize sealed outboard cartridge bearing, 73mm shell
Alloy platform, 3mm pressed pins, 9/16" Cr-Mo axle
Sun Single Track SL-1, 36 hole, 26" F/R, schraeder valve
Specialized disc, 36 hole, bolt on axle, 135mm spacing
Specialized freeride, 8mm steel rails, with X-Brace
7050 hard annodized alloy collar with QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
